===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=こんごういんこ|金剛|tr1=kongō|t1=adamant, extremely strong|鸚哥|tr2=inko|t2=parakeet, macaw, cockatoo}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|こんごう いんこ|acc=5|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こんごう いんこ|コンゴウ インコ|hhira=こんがういんこ}}

# [[macaw]]
# more specifically, the ''[[Ara macao]]'' or {{vern|scarlet macaw}}

====Usage notes====
{{U:ja:biology|コンゴウインコ}} The kana spelling appears to be the most common for this term in general contexts as well, possibly due to the rarity of the kanji for ''inko''.
